test_cases.name: Session Hijacking Mitigation Test
test_cases.description: Verify that session cookies are protected and cannot be captured or reused by an attacker.
test_cases.scenario: Capture network traffic between client and ELB using a packet sniffer and attempt to replay the session cookie to access a protected resource.

test_cases.name: TLS Everywhere Enforcement Test
test_cases.description: Ensure all endpoints enforce HTTPS and redirect HTTP traffic.
test_cases.scenario: Send an HTTP request to the ELB and verify that the response redirects to HTTPS and that the TLS certificate is valid.

test_cases.name: Data at Rest Encryption Test
test_cases.description: Confirm that RDS instances and snapshots are encrypted.
test_cases.scenario: Query the RDS instance properties via the AWS CLI and check the `StorageEncrypted` flag; attempt to download a snapshot without encryption and verify failure.

test_cases.name: DDoS Mitigation Test
test_cases.description: Validate that AWS Shield/WAF rate limiting protects the ELB from high‑volume traffic.
test_cases.scenario: Generate a burst of requests to the ELB using a load‑testing tool and monitor the ELB metrics for throttling or WAF rule hits.

test_cases.name: IAM Least Privilege Test
test_cases.description: Verify that instance profile credentials cannot list S3 buckets they should not access.
test_cases.scenario: Run `aws s3 ls` from an EC2 instance using its IAM role and confirm that access is denied for unauthorized buckets.

test_cases.name: SQL Injection Test
test_cases.description: Check that user input is properly sanitized to prevent SQL injection.
test_cases.scenario: Submit a payload containing SQL code to an input field and observe whether the application returns a database error or leaks data.

test_cases.name: Cross‑Site Scripting (XSS) Test
test_cases.description: Validate that dynamic output is encoded and CSP is enforced.
test_cases.scenario: Inject a script tag into a form field and verify that it is not executed in the browser and that a CSP header is present.
